description: Georgia`s Bisharp evolved from Georgia`s Pawniard sometime before the Donamite Tournament. It was first revealed that it had evolved when Georgia`s Bisharp was sent out to battle against Grace`s Druddigon during the first round of the Donamite Tournament. It only used Metal Sound and Iron Head against Grace`s Druddigon to defeat it and move on to the second round.
name: Kirikizan (Langley)
